original_text: But the angel of the Lord stood in a path of the vineyards, a wall being on this side, and a wall on that side.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자는 포도원 사이 좁은 길에 섰고 좌우에는 담이 있더라

sentences.original_text: But the angel of the Lord stood
in a path of the vineyards
a wall being on this side
and a wall on that side
